name: Customize Your Nest
description:
Made for the Global Game Jam 2019. A little game where you play as a bird looking to kit out their nest. Fly around the world, see what items you can find and bring them home to spruce up your nest!

  • Press space to flap 
  • E to pick up and drop items into your nest
  • P to end the game when you're in your nest
  • Escape to go back to the menu
